Divides the value of a variable by the value of an expression and assigns the result to the variable.

 result /= expression 
==Parameters==
; result: Any numeric variable.
; expression: Any numeric expression.

==Remarks==
Using the '''/=''' operator is the same as specifying: <code>result = result / expression</code>.
